title: WTB: The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin and Company - *PURCHASED*
author: llafoe

posts.post_title: WTB: The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin and Company - *PURCHASED*
posts.post_content: Need a copy (can be well used) sent to an FPO address.  I purchased two copies for home.  Looking to purchase one I can use while I'm in Afghanistan.
Hi.  I have a second copy still in original box I could sell to you for $45 postage paid.  Just let me know.  Thanks. Peter
